channel.title: Self-Help on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Self-Help on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: Why I’ve Never Been a Fan of “Self Help” Books
item.description: I’ve only ever read one, maybe two, “self help” books (depending on how strict your definition is). Not for me. And I wouldn’t want to foist them on anyone else. Might seem odd, considering what I write here. That’s one of the reasons I’ve been so reluctant to write about the things I write about here: because I don’t like the idea of “self help” coming from another person.
